lines.description: --- POTS ---
lines.flavor: --- POTS ---

lines.name: --- POTS ---
lines.description: --- POTS ---
lines.flavor: --- POTS ---

lines.name: --- POTS ---
lines.description: --- POTS ---
lines.flavor: --- POTS ---

lines.name: Sanguine Phial
lines.description: A small taste of the vital essence. Restores a bit of health.

lines.name: Coca Root
lines.description: A bitter root that energizes you as you chew it. Increases movement speed.

lines.name: Medium Sanguine Phial
lines.description: A satisfyingly large draught of the vital essence. Restores a sizeable amount of health.

lines.name: Youth Tonic
lines.description: Dealing damage while under the effects of the Youth Tonic will restore health.

lines.name: Numbing Agent
lines.description: Has a minor numbing effect on the mind. Gives hope.

lines.name: Dungeon Likker
lines.description: A sip of what ferments in the corners of the Necrovale. Provides hope when you kill an enemy.

lines.name: Phlegmatic Phial
lines.description: A small dose of phlegm. Increases your base attack speed for a time.

lines.name: Melancholic Phial
lines.description: A spot of black bile. Increases your base defense for a time.

lines.name: Choleric Phial
lines.description: A sip of yellow bile. Increases your base damage for a time.

lines.name: Quicksilver Phial
lines.description: A sip of shiny metal. Increases your base evasion for a time.

lines.name: Cowards' Tonic
lines.description: Drinking this temporarily provides a magical barrier.

lines.name: Large Sanguine Phial
lines.description: A gluttonous amount of the vital essence. Restores an excessive amount of health.

lines.name: Scouring Agent
lines.description: Destroys memories, including bad ones. Reduces despair.

lines.name: Cyanide
lines.description: Release yourself into nothingness, clearing all despair.

lines.name: Angel's Wing
lines.description: By biting into the Angel's Wing, your attacks will electrify, burn, and freeze enemies.

lines.name: Petrified Foetus
lines.description: The innocence of the foetus destroys all nearby enemies at high cost.

lines.name: Preserved Eye
lines.description: Increases the number of attacks you create, for a time.

lines.name: Strange Brew
lines.description: Keeps the donkey working.

lines.name: Greed Tonic
lines.description: Increases the amount of coins you get, but lowers your defense and evasion.

lines.name: Ire Tonic
lines.description: Returns any damage you recieve to all nearby enemies, but makes all your attacks inaccurate.

lines.name: Arrogance Tonic
lines.description: Increases your chance of dealing a critical hit, but potions have no effect while this is active.

lines.name: Shame Tonic
lines.description: Increases your defense and evasion, but you gain more despair.

lines.name: Fear Tonic
lines.description: Increases the damage you deal, but increases the damage you receive.

lines.name: Sewerfruit
lines.description: Provides a bit of health, but mostly despair.
lines.flavor: Your body rejects this as food.

lines.name: Acridfruit
lines.description: Provides a dollop of health, but a lot of despair.
lines.flavor: A fruit with no desire to be eaten.

lines.name: Bitterfruit
lines.description: Provides some health, and some despair.
lines.flavor: It takes willpower to consume this.

lines.name: Blandfruit
lines.description: Provides a decent amount of health. Doesn't cause despair.
lines.flavor: Merely fine. Hunger might help get it down.

lines.name: Juicyfruit
lines.description: Provides a good amount of health, and a little bit of hope as well.
lines.flavor: An interesting and attractive flavor.

lines.name: Hopefruit
lines.description: Provides a swell of health and hope.
lines.flavor: A beautiful and mysterious flavor, reminiscent of all good things.

lines.name: --- MELEE ---
lines.description: --- MELEE ---
lines.flavor: --- MELEE ---

lines.name: --- MELEE ---
lines.description: --- MELEE ---
lines.flavor: --- MELEE ---

lines.name: --- MELEE ---
lines.description: --- MELEE ---
lines.flavor: --- MELEE ---

lines.name: Rusted Blade
lines.description: A worn down, rusted sword.
lines.flavor: A pathetic weapon, but a weapon nonetheless.

lines.name: Shillelagh
lines.description: A hefty stick with a knot at the end.
lines.flavor: Walk with a big stick, and you will go far.
lines.power_description: Swipe the stick, stunning any nearby enemies.

lines.name: Shortsword
lines.description: A basic, close range weapon.
lines.flavor: The shape of the blade was refined over many generations.
lines.power_description: Perform a power stab, dealing massive damage.

lines.name: Longsword
lines.description: A weapon with long sweeping attacks.
lines.flavor: Proper technique looks funny but is highly effective.

lines.name: Fillet
lines.description: Small close range weapon that attacks quickly.
lines.flavor: Meant for rapid piercing of the kidneys and spleen.
lines.power_description: Throw a fan of piercing daggers.

lines.name: Spear
lines.description: A long stick with a sharp bit on the end.
lines.flavor: Keeps enemies, and fear, at bay.

lines.name: Lochaber Axe
lines.description: Swings out a path in front of you.
lines.flavor: Doesn't cut well. Doesn't need to.

lines.name: Stinger Spear
lines.description: Attacks in quick succession.
lines.flavor: The wafer thin blade allows penetration with little resistance.

lines.name: Zaba Staff
lines.description: A bladed staff that spins around you in a circle.
lines.flavor: It twirls beautifully through the air as it kills.
lines.power_description: Whip the staff in a wide arc.

lines.name: Rustic Club
lines.description: Slow attacks that breaks poise, stunning enemies in a large area.
lines.flavor: A prehistoric implement, satisfying in its simplicity.
lines.power_description: Plow a path ahead of you.

lines.name: Spiked Knuckles
lines.description: Execute a combo of painful punches on enemies.
lines.flavor: Leave no debt unsettled.

lines.name: Hock Chopper
lines.description: A heavy blade that can quickly break an enemies poise, stunning them.
lines.flavor: Meant for crippling horses in warfare.
lines.power_description: Kills are likely to drop health.

lines.name: Dancing Death
lines.description: A curved blade that twirls effortlessly around you.
lines.flavor: Reckless, cruel, vile, and beautiful.

lines.name: Razorice Blade
lines.description: Instantly freezes all enemies you hit.
lines.flavor: Store it alongside sundries to preserve them.
lines.power_description: Launch a barrage of ice shards.

lines.name: Lava Chopper
lines.description: Chop the ground and summon a meteor.
lines.flavor: They might deflect the first blow. They won't deflect the second.
lines.power_description: A cluster of meteors are summoned.

lines.name: Shock Sticker
lines.description: Electrify and break enemies poise, stunning them.
lines.flavor: Plug 'em in and watch 'em dance.

lines.name: Cretin's Poker
lines.description: Hooked spear that pulls enemies closer.
lines.flavor: Used by the tunnel-dwellers to snatch unsuspecting folk into their hidey-holes.
lines.power_description: Do massive knockback in a line.

lines.name: Maulers
lines.description: Swipe at enemies with large bear claws.
lines.flavor: Curiosity might kill a cat, but not a bear.

lines.name: Sunblade
lines.description: Hits have a chance at causing enemies to be Sunlit, negating their evasion.
lines.flavor: What we are is revealed in the sun light.
lines.power_description: Call down a barrage of sun beams.

lines.name: Moonblade
lines.description: Hits have a chance at causing enemies to be Moonlit, negating their defense.
lines.flavor: But what we can be is shrouded in moon light.

lines.name: Wind Sword
lines.description: A thin curved blade that hastens the holder.
lines.flavor: Will you follow the wind, or will the wind follow you?

lines.name: Baylo Blade
lines.description: A blade on the end of a chain that spins around you.
lines.flavor: Like a spinning top of death.
lines.power_description: A fan of blades grinds up any nearby enemies.

lines.name: O' Haleighgong
lines.description: Devestating knockback in a small area.
lines.flavor: The Gong of house O' Haleigh. Said to send mens heads flying while the body stands still.
lines.power_description: Devestating knockback in a large area.

lines.name: Hooked Claw
lines.description: A set of long hooked barbs that attach to the forearms, which pull enemies in.
lines.flavor: Nothing is out of reach.
lines.power_description: Enemies from all around are pulled in and sliced.

lines.name: Executioner's Axe
lines.description: There is a chance that you will Execute an enemy, dealing profound damage.
lines.flavor: Why fear Death? If I am, Death is not. If Death is, I am not.
lines.power_description: All your hits are guaranteed Executions.

lines.name: Cleghorn's Block
lines.description: Brings a heavy block down on unsuspecting fools.
lines.flavor: Ol' Cleghorn had a penchant for gore. He was a good man, though.

lines.name: Hammer of Wotana
lines.description: Low damage, but builds power quickly.
lines.flavor: Only the worthy...

lines.name: Bloodletter
lines.description: Extremely high chance for a critical hit, but damage yourself when you do.
lines.flavor: Celebrating the special bond between enemies.

lines.name: The Edge of Truth
lines.description: Dispense the three aspects of truth.
lines.flavor: Time will cut down all lies, leaving only the truth standing.

lines.name: --- RANGE ---
lines.description: --- RANGE ---
lines.flavor: --- RANGE ---

lines.name: --- RANGE ---
lines.description: --- RANGE ---
lines.flavor: --- RANGE ---

lines.name: --- RANGE ---
lines.description: --- RANGE ---
lines.flavor: --- RANGE ---

lines.name: Shortbow
lines.description: Basic implement for launching arrows.
lines.flavor: An aged piece of Yew with a lot of snap to it.

lines.name: Longbow
lines.description: Send out arrows with incredible force.
lines.flavor: Thick oak haft requiring tremendous strength to draw.
lines.power_description: Launch a powerful arrow that pierces all enemies.

lines.name: Swift Bow
lines.description: A bow capable of shooting at impressive speeds
lines.flavor: The feeling of drawing tension on the bow is silky smooth.

lines.name: Wanderer's Staff
lines.description: Emits energy bolts that veer off course.
lines.flavor: To wander is to move with the wind.
lines.power_description: Release many bolts that seek their target.

lines.name: Runic Staff
lines.description: An old staff that can shoot energy bolts which pierce through enemies.
lines.flavor: The gnarled piece of wood is covered with runes and radiating a strange energy.
lines.power_description: The bolt will last a very long time and bounces.

lines.name: Stardust Staff
lines.description: Release a flurry of exploding stars.
lines.flavor: The birth and death of a billion tiny galaxies, right before your eyes.
lines.power_description: The stars last a long time, and bounce around.

lines.name: Dart Gun
lines.description: A small device that can rapidly shoot darts.
lines.flavor: Far from fearsome, but useful in the right context.
lines.power_description: Emit a wave of darts that stuns enemies.

lines.name: Showman's Bow
lines.description: Shoots out multiple arrows at once in an impressive display.
lines.flavor: The design was perfected by a traveling grifter.
lines.power_description: Create a dazzling fan of arrows.

lines.name: Unruly Bow
lines.description: Unleashes a wild burst of arrows.
lines.flavor: Don't try to control it. Just unleash it.
lines.power_description: The wild burst becomes utterly unmanageable.

lines.name: Primordial Wand
lines.description: Launches shards of ice that shatter and freeze enemies.
lines.flavor: The Age of Ice is what shaped us.
lines.power_description: The shards explode and freeze enemies.

lines.name: Thunder Staff
lines.description: Call down a bolt of lightning.
lines.flavor: The air around it holds tension like the hours before a great storm.
lines.power_description: The lightning chains to many targets.

lines.name: Flame Column Staff
lines.description: Summon a pillar of fire.
lines.flavor: The cost of each pillar is beyond understanding.

lines.name: Rain Bow
lines.description: Shoot out an arrow with all status effects.
lines.flavor: Suffering is what bonds us.
lines.power_description: A barrage of arrows are guaranteed to cause all status effects.

lines.name: Javelin
lines.description: Hurls a large projectiles that punches through enemies.
lines.flavor: Bearer of great inertia.

lines.name: Chaff Launcher
lines.description: Launches clusters of chaff.
lines.flavor: Say farewell to your collarbones.
lines.power_description: Launch a huge cluster of chaff.

lines.name: Hotshot
lines.description: Shoots out a barrage of arrows that ignite enemies.
lines.flavor: The speed of the projectile sparks it as it leaves the bow.
lines.power_description: Hitting an enemy drops a meteor on them

lines.name: Wo Mur Ran
lines.description: An oddly shaped piece of wood that returns to you.
lines.flavor: Don't forget your warrior's wolf tail.
lines.power_description: The Wo Mur Ran moves at incredible speeds and does more damage.

lines.name: Obsidian Staff
lines.description: A staff that creates balls of fire.
lines.flavor: The obsidian remembers the lava.
lines.power_description: Create three fireballs that explode on impact.

lines.name: Arc Staff
lines.description: Releases an electric bolt that arcs between targets.
lines.flavor: All life is connected by death.

lines.name: Crystal Staff
lines.description: Form a pillar of ice.
lines.flavor: To freeze is to return to what you once were.

lines.name: Kalemonvo's Bane
lines.description: Does more damage with higher hope.
lines.flavor: To some, it can pierce the heavens. To others, it's nothing.

lines.name: Mangrove Staff
lines.description: Unleash a hurricane that sweeps away enemies.
lines.flavor: The Mire Shamans believe our penitence will come in the form of a great Hurricane.

lines.name: Hand Cannon
lines.description: Launch an explosive in the air.
lines.flavor: Just don't get hoisted by your own petard.

lines.name: Bomba Bow
lines.description: A bow that shoots out explosive arrows.
lines.flavor: Pure, dazzling spectacle.
lines.power_description: The arrow pierces, causing an explosion with each hit.

lines.name: Cobra Bow
lines.description: Shoots out arrows that aren't satisfied by one target.
lines.flavor: You can feel an evil hunger in the bow.
lines.power_description: Shoot two additional arrows with massive range.

lines.name: The Deadeye
lines.description: Shoots long-range, piercing shots that do more damage to each successive target.
lines.flavor: The tool of a professional killer.
lines.power_description: The damage gain is massively increased, and the arrow seeks targets

lines.name: Crusher Staff
lines.description: Sends out a dense mass of energy that crushes anything it touches.
lines.flavor: Look closely and you can see the entire universe swirling in its orb.
lines.power_description: The Crusher last far longer, and pulls enemies into it.

lines.name: Apocalypse Staff
lines.description: Unleash a rain of meteors.
lines.flavor: Do not fear the end / This world was meant / To be destroyed / And created again
lines.power_description: Meteors shower down all around you

lines.name: Flamejet Staff
lines.description: A staff that releases dazzling jets of flame.
lines.flavor: An oddity from the southern mire-shamans.
lines.power_description: Send out a ring of flames.

lines.name: --- OFHND ---
lines.description: --- OFHND ---
lines.flavor: --- OFHND ---

lines.name: --- OFHND ---
lines.description: --- OFHND ---
lines.flavor: --- OFHND ---

lines.name: --- OFHND ---
lines.description: --- OFHND ---
lines.flavor: --- OFHND ---

lines.name: Heater Shield
lines.description: Protects you from damage while held up.
lines.flavor: The iconic tool of a man willing to risk his life for a cause.

lines.name: Skipjack Totem
lines.description: You roll faster.
lines.flavor: I can not hide / Nor can I flee / For the skipjack fix'd his eye on me.

lines.name: Bulwark Shield
lines.description: Increases your poise, making you harder to stun, but slows poise recovery.

lines.name: Death Whistle
lines.description: Blow it to stun all nearby enemies.
lines.flavor: To frighten enemies, or just relive a moment of viciousness.

lines.name: Knave of Hearts
lines.description: Throw out a ring of daggers.
lines.flavor: It's a full house, and you aren't welcome.

lines.name: Salto Crest
lines.description: Decreases your roll cooldown.
lines.flavor: Patron of the Jester / Friend to the Knave / Jokerman dance to the grave

lines.name: Entropic Staff
lines.description: Summon a blizzard, freezing all enemies in an area.
lines.flavor: A beautiful creation, from those who worship the Entropic Gods.

lines.name: Frostskin Staff
lines.description: Cover yourself in a protective layer of ice.

lines.name: Mountain Shield
lines.description: Blocking an enemy knocks them back.
lines.flavor: The only thing that can defeat a mountain is time.

lines.name: Wall of Suffering
lines.description: When you block an enemy, they are hit with a Flame Column.
lines.flavor: What do you get more of, the more you create?

lines.name: Corpse Defiler
lines.description: The nearest corpse explodes, causing damage to all nearby enemies.
lines.flavor: The staff speeds up the natural decomposition process, turning the gastric contents into an explosive. The smell is intense.

lines.name: Rohrer Crest Shield
lines.description: While active, you resist despair.
lines.flavor: The Rohrer men stand tall and proud, tracing their lineage back to The Father himself.

lines.name: Screaming Skull
lines.description: Throw screaming skulls.
lines.flavor: Ask yourself, why do they scream?

lines.name: Nowhere Wand
lines.description: Create a ring of fire around yourself.
lines.flavor: Nowhere is safe.

lines.name: --- HLMET ---
lines.description: --- HLMET ---
lines.flavor: --- HLMET ---

lines.name: --- HLMET ---
lines.description: --- HLMET ---
lines.flavor: --- HLMET ---

lines.name: --- HLMET ---
lines.description: --- HLMET ---
lines.flavor: --- HLMET ---

lines.name: Straw Hat
lines.description: Provides a bit of health.
lines.flavor: Mostly useless, and foolish looking to boot.

lines.name: Skullcap
lines.description: Occasionally evades an attack.
lines.flavor: A ratty old scrap of leather. You can put it on your head if you want.

lines.name: Dirty Bandana
lines.description: Potions last a while longer.
lines.flavor: A drunken fool at least knows how to drink.

lines.name: Hunter's Cap
lines.description: You can see farther.
lines.flavor: One must eat the other, who runs free before him.

lines.name: Ill-Fitting Cap
lines.description: A poorly fitting helmet that lowers your accuracy.
lines.flavor: The massive bowl covers your eyes.

lines.name: Pigiron
lines.description: Slightly reduces incoming damage.
lines.flavor: A disintegrating iron helmet. Was likely meant to be decorative.

lines.name: Crude Helmet
lines.description: A crudely made helmet, by an inexperienced blacksmith.
lines.flavor: Entrusting your life to a fool makes you a fool, too.

lines.name: Juggernaut's Helm
lines.description: Rolling into enemies knocks them back.
lines.flavor: Move or I'll move you.

lines.name: Oiled Hood
lines.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
lines.flavor: Oils keep the leather supple.

lines.name: Beggar's Hood
lines.description: More coins drop.
lines.flavor: Need is the opposite of luck.

lines.name: Tam o' Shanter
lines.description: Your attacks have longer range.
lines.flavor: A jaunty and colorful hat, proudly hand-knit from wool.

lines.name: Floppy Coif
lines.description: Potions last a lot longer, but aren't as effective.
lines.flavor: Conceals your altered state.

lines.name: Mage Hat
lines.description: Adds a slight magical barrier around the wearer.
lines.flavor: Imparts dignity and gravitas upon the wearer.

lines.name: Focusing Circlet
lines.description: Focuses the spread of your attacks.

lines.name: Cathbarr
lines.description: You take less damage.
lines.flavor: Greater men than you have died wearing this.

lines.name: Chapel Helm
lines.description: Helps break an enemies poise faster, stunning them.
lines.flavor: Wide visibility allows you to identify weaknesses.

lines.name: Crusaders Helm
lines.description: Defends against damage and despair.
lines.flavor: A proud identifier of a righteous man.

lines.name: Cult Symbol
lines.description: When you attack, nearby enemies are stunned.
lines.flavor: Obedience or death, the options of a true cult.

lines.name: Spectacles
lines.description: Your book is much more effective.
lines.flavor: Always read the fine print.

lines.name: Mask of Shame
lines.description: You deal more damage, but feel despair most acutely.
lines.flavor: Shame can not hurt you when used as a weapon.

lines.name: Chieftain's Headress
lines.description: You deal more damage, but it's harder to stun enemies.
lines.flavor: Authority is latent violence.

lines.name: Crown of Elation
lines.description: For each active potion, you deal more damage.
lines.flavor: Elation never lasts.

lines.name: Gossamer Hood
lines.description: Provides a massive barrier, but reduces your health considerably.
lines.flavor: We are tethered to life by the finest thread.

lines.name: The Mollusk
lines.description: Take less damage while standing still.
lines.flavor: The Mollusk lingers, with its wandering eye.

lines.name: Helm of Command
lines.description: Your attacks are larger, and reach farther.
lines.flavor: Sometimes a leader is nothing more than his hat.

lines.name: Beautiful Armet
lines.description: Excellent defense, but you are stunned more easily.
lines.flavor: A true craftsman speaks through his work.

lines.name: Thorn of Crowns
lines.description: Whenever you're dealt damage, the life lost becomes a spirit that seeks the attacker.
lines.flavor: Our misdeeds come back upon us. Sometimes rather quickly.

lines.name: Balor Mask
lines.description: Fire now spreads.
lines.flavor: If the world should end in fire, this is how it will begin.

lines.name: Rift Conduit
lines.description: All nearby enemies are electrified, taking 50% more damage.
lines.flavor: The air around you feels like it's about to snap.

lines.name: Void Mask
lines.description: Looking at enemies freezes them.
lines.flavor: The mask hides your face, but reveals you.

lines.name: Fertility Garland
lines.description: Your armor, gloves, and boots are more effective.
lines.flavor: Potency, life, renewal, death.

lines.name: Crown of Storms
lines.description: When you hit an electrified enemy, lightning strikes them.
lines.flavor: A delicate filigree creation that rests upon your head like a nimbus cloud.

lines.name: Hellfire Crown
lines.description: When a flaming enemy dies, it explodes, damaging and igniting nearby enemies.
lines.flavor: Curse or blessing, what is the difference anymore.

lines.name: Whiteout Crown
lines.description: Frozen enemies emit shards of ice, damaging nearby enemies.

lines.name: Steeleye Circlet
lines.description: When you land a critical hit, emit a barrage of daggers.
lines.flavor: It takes a steel eye to see reality.

lines.name: Deathseeker's Hood
lines.description: Your attacks have a chance of Executing an enemy, dealing profound damage
lines.flavor: More seek death than you would expect.

lines.name: Crown of Arrogance
lines.description: You constantly emit shards of ice that seek their target.
lines.flavor: The heart of an arrogant man is never at ease.

lines.name: --- ARMOR ---
lines.description: --- ARMOR ---
lines.flavor: --- ARMOR ---

lines.name: --- ARMOR ---
lines.description: --- ARMOR ---
lines.flavor: --- ARMOR ---

lines.name: --- ARMOR ---
lines.description: --- ARMOR ---
lines.flavor: --- ARMOR ---

lines.name: Tattered Jerkin
lines.description: Grants additional health.
lines.flavor: You wont be winning any fashion shows. Then again, maybe you will.

lines.name: Peasant's Blouse
lines.description: Grants a small amount of evasion.
lines.flavor: A peasant's lot is to survive.

lines.name: Overtight Tunic
lines.description: Provides evasion, but restricts attacks.
lines.flavor: Better uncomfortable than dead.

lines.name: Crude Plate
lines.description: Provides some defense.
lines.flavor: Crude, ill-fitting, and poorly crafted. It can stop a blow, however.

lines.name: Heavy Iron Plate
lines.description: Provides good defense, but slows you down.
lines.flavor: It will get you there in one piece. Eventually.

lines.name: Thrall's Plate
lines.description: Good defense, but nothing else.
lines.flavor: Befitting a man with little regard.

lines.name: Thief's Tunic
lines.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
lines.flavor: Not noticed, not killed.

lines.name: Storm-caller's Cloak
lines.description: Your attacks electrify enemies, causing them to take more damage.
lines.flavor: There is danger and education in living a reckless lifestyle.

lines.name: Drunkards Shirt
lines.description: Potion effects last longer, and potions drop more often.
lines.flavor: Drinking is the art of avoiding life.

lines.name: Coat of Plates
lines.description: You take less damage.
lines.flavor: A primitive protective garment, from a long conquered culture.

lines.name: The Hodgepodge
lines.description: Does a little bit of everything.
lines.flavor: But nothing very well.

lines.name: Fitted Chestplate
lines.description: Defends you, and increases your poise, making it harder to be stunned.
lines.flavor: The fit is unnervingly perfect...

lines.name: Sharkskin Tunic
lines.description: You do more damage when moving.
lines.flavor: Stillness is for the dead.

lines.name: Firebrand Cape
lines.description: Flaming enemies do less damage to you.
lines.flavor: A good magician never reveals their secrets. Sometimes they don't even know them.

lines.name: Survivors Plate
lines.description: You emit daggers.
lines.flavor: Rumored to once be worn by a Vampire.

lines.name: Illusory Cloak
lines.description: You evade attacks while moving.
lines.flavor: The perfect accessory for the man who would like to make a strong impression, then vanish.

lines.name: Warding Robe
lines.description: Projects a magical barrier around the wearer.
lines.flavor: A silken garment, which imbues the wearer with a dangerous sense of safety.

lines.name: Celebratory Tunic
lines.description: You are healed whenever you evade an attack.
lines.flavor: The good times are here again, rejoice.

lines.name: Verglas Coat
lines.description: When you take damage, emit frozen ice shards.
lines.flavor: The proper response to an unfriendly greeting.

lines.name: The Slubberdegullion
lines.description: Enemies drop far more health globs.
lines.flavor: Lick the bones clean.

lines.name: Savage Coat
lines.description: Killing an enemy heals you.
lines.flavor: It's not that it hurts less, it's that you notice it less.

lines.name: Chains of Ire
lines.description: When you roll, you release a cluster of mortars.
lines.flavor: Life is a battle, fought in inches.

lines.name: Jazerant
lines.description: You can not lose more than a percentage of your health from a single blow.
lines.flavor: Death by a thousand cuts, maybe. Death by a single blow, never.

lines.name: Tiarna's Mantle
lines.description: When an enemy does damage to you, they are hit by lightning.
lines.flavor: Things have a way of balancing out.

lines.name: Reflective Shell
lines.description: Evading an enemies projectile sends it back at them.
lines.flavor: A carefree vindication of wrongdoings.

lines.name: Monk's Robe
lines.description: Easily evade attacks.
lines.flavor: Walk without fear of lesser men.

lines.name: Links of Carnage
lines.description: A buzzsaw orbits around you, tearing into any enemy it touches.
lines.flavor: The gore splatter is hard to avoid, however.

lines.name: Ritter's Aegis
lines.description: While attacking, your defense is massively increased.
lines.flavor: Do not reject suffering, and do not accept it. Embrace it.

lines.name: Hexsheild
lines.description: The effect of any curses is massively reduced.
lines.flavor: Sometimes avoiding bad luck is better than having good luck.

lines.name: Battlepriest Raiment
lines.description: Critical hits do more damage.
lines.flavor: Good fortune is a blessing, from the machinery of the Universe.

lines.name: Bloody Deerskin
lines.description: You have no defense, evasion, or barrier. But you deal more damage.
lines.flavor: Naked but for your instincts.

lines.name: Coward's Cloak
lines.description: Provides no health, but you become incredibly difficult to hit.
lines.flavor: There is bravery in hiding away. But only a tiny bit.

lines.name: Roarke's Kilt
lines.description: You now dash with all of your attacks.
lines.flavor: There's nothing here for a coward.

lines.name: Bestia Loincloth
lines.description: Your roll cooldown is massively reduced, but it no longer evades attacks.
lines.flavor: Don it at your own risk.

lines.name: --- GLVES ---
lines.description: --- GLVES ---
lines.flavor: --- GLVES ---

lines.name: --- GLVES ---
lines.description: --- GLVES ---
lines.flavor: --- GLVES ---

lines.name: --- GLVES ---
lines.description: --- GLVES ---
lines.flavor: --- GLVES ---

lines.name: Leather Mittens
lines.description: Allows for occasional evasion of attacks, but slows all projectiles.
lines.flavor: They are ill-tailored to drawing a bowstring.

lines.name: Dandy Gloves
lines.description: Provide health, but little else.
lines.flavor: I'd guess that the man who lost these didn't get too far.

lines.name: Archer's Bracer
lines.description: Provides no defense, but your projectiles may pierce enemies.
lines.flavor: A true master is two steps ahead of his enemies, and one step behind himself.

lines.name: Ornamental Gage
lines.description: Slightly increases the effect of potions.
lines.flavor: At the end of the day, Vermouth and Moonshine get you to the same place.

lines.name: Iron Mittens
lines.description: Provides great defense, but slows your attack speed.
lines.flavor: The best defense is a good defense.

lines.name: Heavy Bracers
lines.description: Increases your poise damage, stunning enemies more easily.
lines.flavor: It's about proper technique, not raw power.

lines.name: Leather Gloves
lines.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
lines.flavor: Meant for work. Killing is work.

lines.name: Slipshot Wristwrap
lines.description: You attack faster and your projectiles move faster.
lines.flavor: Better to be fast than good.

lines.name: Ratfingers
lines.description: You find much more gold.
lines.flavor: It's amazing what you can find once you abandon dignity.

lines.name: Flint-tip Mitts
lines.description: Your attacks ignite enemies, causing them to take damage over time.
lines.flavor: Put them away when you enter a wooden house.

lines.name: Gauntlets of Despair
lines.description: You deal more damage, but feel a creeping sense of dread at all times.
lines.flavor: Nothing is free. Sometimes, you just can't see the cost right away.

lines.name: Steel Handles
lines.description: You take less damage.
lines.flavor: Steel gloves to protect the hands and wrists.

lines.name: Workadays
lines.description: You deal more damage, but are unlikely to deliver a critical hit.
lines.flavor: Work hard and don't expect much.

lines.name: Silken Gloves
lines.description: Adds a slight magical barrier around the wearer.

lines.name: Heartseekers
lines.description: Projectiles seek out enemies.
lines.flavor: Each projectile is fused with the soul of an aggrieved fallen.

lines.name: Heavy Strap
lines.description: Your projectiles may now pierce through enemies.
lines.flavor: The weak should fear the strong.

lines.name: Demon Fingers
lines.description: You attack faster and are more likely to deliver a critical hit.
lines.flavor: Every sin has a price to be paid.

lines.name: Scatterbangs
lines.description: Your attacks become inaccurate, but deal slightly more damage.
lines.flavor: They'll get to the point eventually.

lines.name: Monkey Hide Gloves
lines.description: Your projectiles bounce off walls, increasing their damage.
lines.flavor: Imparts the wild kinetic energy of a being whose life depends on it.

lines.name: Exploding Heart Technique
lines.description: Enemies at low health spontaneously die.
lines.flavor: A kick is not sufficient when they're down.

lines.name: Golden Fingernail
lines.description: Increases the number of attacks you create.
lines.flavor: A delicate thing that shines beautifully in the low light.

lines.name: Grenadier Gloves
lines.description: All of your attacks explode.
lines.flavor: Burn it all. Let The Father sort it out.

lines.name: Avalanche Gloves
lines.description: Successive hits with a single attack do more damage.
lines.flavor: A single snowflake can destroy a village.

lines.name: Manhandlers
lines.description: When you hit an enemy, they are knocked back. If they hit a wall, they take extra damage.
lines.flavor: Violence is the far end of diplomancy.

lines.name: Shattertips
lines.description: Frozen enemies have a chance to shatter when hit.
lines.flavor: Beautiful to the right eye.

lines.name: Viperfists
lines.description: You attack faster.
lines.flavor: The proof of the Viper is in the strike.

lines.name: Singularities
lines.description: Your attack count is set to one, but each additional attack adds damage and attack size.
lines.flavor: All things began as one.

lines.name: Ichorites
lines.description: Steal health when you deal damage.
lines.flavor: The ichor is an acquired taste.

lines.name: Boilermakers
lines.description: Each attack in a sequence does more damage.
lines.flavor: It's not the first attempt that matters. It's the last.

lines.name: Alchemist's Gloves
lines.description: Potions are more effective, last longer, and you find more of them

lines.name: Stormtouch Gauntlets
lines.description: A lightning storm follows you.
lines.flavor: Light travels faster than sound. Death travels faster than light.

lines.name: --- BOOTS ---
lines.description: --- BOOTS ---
lines.flavor: --- BOOTS ---

lines.name: --- BOOTS ---
lines.description: --- BOOTS ---
lines.flavor: --- BOOTS ---

lines.name: --- BOOTS ---
lines.description: --- BOOTS ---
lines.flavor: --- BOOTS ---

lines.name: Messenger's Shoes
lines.description: Provides no defense, but slightly increases movement speed.
lines.flavor: The soles provide extra traction, allowing a quicker pace.

lines.name: Cleats
lines.description: Provides poise.
lines.flavor: En garde!

lines.name: Stylish Shoes
lines.description: Provides slight evasion.
lines.flavor: Would be impressive, if there were anyone to impress.

lines.name: Spiked Boots
lines.description: Offers no defense, but you do more damage
lines.flavor: Spite will lead men to make strange choices.

lines.name: Stompers
lines.description: Great defense, but slows movement.
lines.flavor: Don't expect to surprise anyone.

lines.name: Sturdy Leathers
lines.description: Solid defense and health.
lines.flavor: They have carried many men through many campaigns.

lines.name: Softshoes
lines.description: You will sometimes evade attacks.
lines.flavor: Might as well dance a lick through the cell of your life.

lines.name: Lickspittles
lines.description: Taking damage gives you power.
lines.flavor: Servile... until you aren't.

lines.name: Greaves
lines.description: You take less damage.
lines.flavor: Sturdy boots with steel plate sewn on.

lines.name: Dead-man's Boots
lines.description: Your attacks freeze enemies, causing them to move and attack slower.
lines.flavor: Wearing them makes the warmth of life feel distant.

lines.name: Seasoned Boots
lines.description: Good defense and evasion.
lines.flavor: They have survived many battles, even if their owners may not.

lines.name: Slickice Boots
lines.description: You slide around.
lines.flavor: There is no one to complain to when you fall.

lines.name: Acrobat Slippers
lines.description: You run faster and can roll more often.
lines.flavor: The art of movement.

lines.name: Messenger of Death
lines.description: Attacking no longer causes you to stop moving.
lines.flavor: There is no negotiating with death, only outrunning it.

lines.name: Mucklucks
lines.description: Your attack range is less, but your damage is increased.
lines.flavor: Only for those unafraid to confront the terrors of this world.

lines.name: Slippers
lines.description: Adds a slight magical barrier around the wearer.
lines.flavor: Well-kept toenails are needed to keep from tearing the fine fabric.

lines.name: Bullhooves
lines.description: Generate power faster.
lines.flavor: One victory often leads to another.

lines.name: Firewalkers
lines.description: You leave a trail of fire behind you.
lines.flavor: Suffering is the path of wisdom.

lines.name: Stonesouls
lines.description: Your poise is massively increased, preventing stun.
lines.flavor: Steady on.

lines.name: Kingly Boots
lines.description: Your attacks are larger.
lines.flavor: A rightful king is courage personified.

lines.name: Pattens
lines.description: Your roll cooldown is reduced.
lines.flavor: Dance while you can.

lines.name: Soulsteppers
lines.description: When you kill an enemy, you gain Hope but lose Health.
lines.flavor: Take what you want, just be willing to pay the price.

lines.name: Matador's Mandoletinas
lines.description: Excellent Evasion, but you lose all defense.
lines.flavor: Bravery can never be taught, only learned.

lines.name: Winklepickers
lines.description: Your amulet effect is enhanced.
lines.flavor: A silly shoe that has trod on the back of many poor fools.

lines.name: Winged Sandals
lines.description: You move swiftly.
lines.flavor: Press on, with swiftness and grace.

lines.name: Fleetfoot Boots
lines.description: You run and attack significantly faster.
lines.flavor: Wearing them almost feels like freedom.

lines.name: Spatial Folds
lines.description: You teleport to your target before attacking.
lines.flavor: Ignore what you see while folding space. They are beings beyond consideration.

lines.name: Redoublers
lines.description: All your attacks are doubled.
lines.flavor: Footwork is the foundation of combat.

lines.name: Merchant's Shoes
lines.description: You find items with a higher Refinement Level.
lines.flavor: Never leave success up to chance.

lines.name: --- AMLET ---
lines.description: --- AMLET ---
lines.flavor: --- AMLET ---

lines.name: --- AMLET ---
lines.description: --- AMLET ---
lines.flavor: --- AMLET ---

lines.name: --- AMLET ---
lines.description: --- AMLET ---
lines.flavor: --- AMLET ---

lines.name: Deep Freeze Amulet
lines.description: Freezing an enemy is more effective.
lines.flavor: Cold is the cousin of death.

lines.name: Wise Spirit
lines.description: Potions are more effective.
lines.flavor: The spirit of a woman with much accrued wisdom has found home in this locket.

lines.name: Soothing Spirit
lines.description: On completing a level, you gain health.
lines.flavor: A fair and temperant judge lingers on, quenching the fires of extremity.

lines.name: Tinkling Bell
lines.description: Projectiles do much more poise damage, stunning enemies.
lines.flavor: The sound of the bell will drive the wicked insane.

lines.name: Ruddy Chain
lines.description: Gives you more health.
lines.flavor: Enriches and warms the blood. Reddens the cheeks.

lines.name: Protective Spirit
lines.description: Grants a magical barrier, and makes your barrier regenerate more quickly.
lines.flavor: The spirit of a protective and nurturing Mother has found home in this trinket.

lines.name: Seer's Amulet
lines.description: Your attacks have much more range.
lines.flavor: A smooth ancient stone, unchanged for a thousand generations.

lines.name: Extinction Amulet
lines.description: You are healed when dealing a critical hit.
lines.flavor: More life has left this world than will ever be created again.

lines.name: Splenetic Amulet
lines.description: Gain power upon killing an enemy.
lines.flavor: Ire comes from the spleen.

lines.name: Hopeless Emblem
lines.description: When you do damage, you heal yourself and gain despair.
lines.flavor: Being witness to the endless cycle of suffering inspires in you a hopeless feeling.

lines.name: Mark of the Tyrant
lines.description: Enemies don't move when knocked back, and are stunned for longer.
lines.flavor: Without conscience, the world is a magnificent toy.

lines.name: Vengeful Amulet
lines.description: You deal more damage, but you also take more damage.
lines.flavor: Hatred is the only truly effective emotion.

lines.name: Ghostly Pendant
lines.description: Dodging counts as evading.

lines.name: Contagious Laughter
lines.description: Electrified enemies damage other nearby electrified enemies.
lines.flavor: Once you get the joke of life, you will laugh to the grave.

lines.name: BloodshotEye
lines.description: Nearby enemies take more damage.
lines.flavor: There is no room in this world for a blood stained eye.

lines.name: Elemental Whirlwind
lines.description: For every status effect on an enemy (burning, freezing, electrified), they take more damage.
lines.flavor: A body is the story of what it has suffered.

lines.name: Cobra Necklace
lines.description: All of your projectiles seek an extra target.

lines.name: Conductive Chain
lines.description: When lightning strikes an electrified target, more follow.
lines.flavor: Lightning never strikes twice. But sometimes it strikes three times.

lines.name: Black Ice Charm
lines.description: Frozen enemies turn into pillars of ice when they die.
lines.flavor: An invisible danger that has claimed many unsuspecting lives.

lines.name: Pyromaniac's Choker
lines.description: Burning damage applies much more frequently.
lines.flavor: I'm ready to close my mind and lose myself on the burning sands.

lines.name: Third Eye
lines.description: Increase the number of attacks you create.
lines.flavor: The left eye sees the past. The right eye sees the future. The third eye sees the truth.

lines.name: Mirrored Locket
lines.description: When your projectile is destroyed, it forks.
lines.flavor: A small locket with a pair of mirrors inside. The memories of what it has seen are passed back and forth for eternity.

lines.name: The Tosspot
lines.description: Potions are consumed immediately instead of being picked up. They are far more effective.
lines.flavor: Strip away the dressings, and living is mere consumption.

lines.name: Harlot's Amulet
lines.description: You gain significantly more Hope.
lines.flavor: It's a rare flower that can bloom in the dark.

lines.name: Heart of Courage
lines.description: Your health is massively reduced. Your damage is massively increased.
lines.flavor: True courage is only revealed in the maw of reality.

lines.name: Heart of Greed
lines.description: Your health is massively reduced.
lines.flavor: A greedy man has no taste for life, only the shadow of dreams.

lines.name: --- BOOKS ---
lines.description: --- BOOKS ---
lines.flavor: --- BOOKS ---

lines.name: --- BOOKS ---
lines.description: --- BOOKS ---
lines.flavor: --- BOOKS ---

lines.name: --- BOOKS ---
lines.description: --- BOOKS ---
lines.flavor: --- BOOKS ---

lines.name: Einkorn's Treatise
lines.description: You are more likely to deliver a critical hit.
lines.flavor: An easily debunked bit of propaganda.

lines.name: Fiona's Diary
lines.description: Adds a nice chunk of health.
lines.flavor: The story of a life cut short.

lines.name: The Joy of Life
lines.description: Healing is more effective.
lines.flavor: What can you touch but never hold?

lines.name: Astrid's Lullaby
lines.description: Gain Hope when starting a level.
lines.flavor: A new life is all potential, and potential is hope.

lines.name: Foraging Guide
lines.description: Potions can drop at a higher Refinement Level.
lines.flavor: Where to look, what to look for, and what to avoid.

lines.name: The New Havamal
lines.description: Reading its terse passages brings comfort, increasing Hope gain.
lines.flavor: "Truth is a path / Deep into the woods / Of the unknown / That ends where it began."

lines.name: The Prince of Thorns
lines.description: You gain power at an increased rate.
lines.flavor: A book with sinister ideas on power and politics.

lines.name: Savage Dictolydium
lines.description: Runes are more effective.
lines.flavor: A compendium of brutal truths.

lines.name: Deranged Sermon
lines.description: Lightning now strikes in a larger area, and sets enemies on fire.
lines.flavor: The rambling madness within becomes clarity and conviction with time.

lines.name: Book of Seasons
lines.description: Provides all elemental strikes.
lines.flavor: The story of seasons precedes our own, and will continue on without us.

lines.name: Book of Days
lines.description: Provides Sunstrike and Moonstrike, potentially bypassing evasion and defense.
lines.flavor: A day is the building block in the story of our lives.

lines.name: Makar's Banned Verses
lines.description: Fire is far more devestating.
lines.flavor: Each word is a burning ember, illuminating a beauty and pain too great for this middling world.

lines.name: Monsters Guide
lines.description: Enemies start with reduced health.
lines.flavor: A study of the essence of every enemy you might face in the Necrovale.

lines.name: Brumal Edda
lines.description: Ice attacks do more damage.
lines.flavor: Fragment of a poem written of the icy end of the world.

lines.name: Atumnal Edda
lines.description: Fire attacks do more damage.
lines.flavor: Fragment of a poem written about the fiery beginning of the world.

lines.name: Vernal Edda
lines.description: Electric attacks do more damage.
lines.flavor: Fragment of a poem written about the golden age of men.

lines.name: The Yadomejutsu
lines.description: Your attacks reflect projectiles.
lines.flavor: Turnabout is fair play.

lines.name: Jereaux's Billfold
lines.description: Picking up coins heals you.
lines.flavor: Money wont save your soul, but it can save your life.

lines.name: Crusader's Dirge
lines.description: Killing enemies provides hope.
lines.flavor: Mourn for them by continuing their righteous cause.

lines.name: Blackthorn's Logbook
lines.description: You sometimes get an extra level choice.
lines.flavor: Blackthorn was one of the few to preserve his deep knowledge of the Necrovale.

lines.name: Alchemical Codex
lines.description: Potions drop much more frequently.
lines.flavor: Alchemy is where knowledge and matter meet.

lines.name: Desiderata
lines.description: Blessings are far more effective.
lines.flavor: With all its sham, drudgery, and broken dreams, it is still a beautiful world.

lines.name: The Warrior Poet
lines.description: Power moves themselves can generate power.
lines.flavor: A coward fears violence, so a coward is never wise.

lines.name: Book of Lost Souls
lines.description: You deal far more damage, but become utterly Hopeless.
lines.flavor: When you wander from the path, there are many strange things you can find.

lines.name: Craftsman's Blueprints
lines.description: Ember drops are of a higher refinement level.
lines.flavor: Understanding your own tools is the key to using them effectively.

lines.name: The Wheel of Life
lines.description: You lose less hope on dying.
lines.flavor: Suffering keeps the wheel of life turning.

lines.name: Gambler's Dice
lines.description: You take much more damage, but are more likely to evade attacks.
lines.flavor: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

lines.name: --- RUNES ---
lines.description: --- RUNES ---
lines.flavor: --- RUNES ---

lines.name: --- RUNES ---
lines.description: --- RUNES ---
lines.flavor: --- RUNES ---

lines.name: --- RUNES ---
lines.description: --- RUNES ---
lines.flavor: --- RUNES ---

lines.name: Rune of the Lizard
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, burning does more damage.
lines.flavor: The mark left by a hot iron.

lines.name: Rune of the Wolf
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, freeze slows enemies more.
lines.flavor: Drawn with blue ink under the skin.

lines.name: Rune of the Hawk
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, electrified causes more damage.
lines.flavor: Honoring those who have freed themselves from this world.

lines.name: Rune of the Horse
lines.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you move faster.
lines.flavor: Relic of the forebearers, the men who tamed horses.

lines.name: Rune of the Worm
lines.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you steal a small amount of health from enemies.
lines.flavor: Beneath notice, quietly rejuvenating the world.

lines.name: Rune of the Boar
lines.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you do more damage.
lines.flavor: Giver and taker of life, full of masculine vitality.

lines.name: Rune of the Snake
lines.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you attack faster.
lines.flavor: The most ancient foe of man. We have not forgotten his many forms.

lines.name: Rune of the Sparrow
lines.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, you gain more Hope.
lines.flavor: A hint of the freedom of a sparrow, in your pocket.

lines.name: Potent Reagent
lines.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, potions are more effective, but don't last as long.
lines.flavor: A flame that burns twice as bright lasts one fifth as long.

lines.name: Carved Crystal
lines.description: While this is sitting in your inventory, blessings are more effective.
lines.flavor: Man cannot create beauty. Only discover it.

lines.name: Underwood's Curse
lines.description: Your health constantly drains, but you steal health.
lines.flavor: It just runs in their blood.

lines.name: Rune of the Phoenix
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, you are resurrected upon death. However, this rune will be destroyed in the process.
lines.flavor: Life is a dream you are perpetually waking from.

lines.name: Wretch's Memento
lines.description: While in your inventory, you lose fewer Coins upon dying.
lines.flavor: To live is to let yourself fail.

lines.name: Well Wishing Charm
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, increases the levels of items you find.
lines.flavor: Wish, but never wish for too much.

lines.name: Rune of the Ass
lines.description: Gain a small amount of health upon completing a level.
lines.flavor: If you're not good, you damn sure better be persistent.

lines.name: Tessera
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, you are more mobile while blocking.
lines.flavor: Our deeds are not judged, merely recorded.

lines.name: --- CLCTB ---
lines.description: --- CLCTB ---
lines.flavor: --- CLCTB ---

lines.name: --- CLCTB ---
lines.description: --- CLCTB ---
lines.flavor: --- CLCTB ---

lines.name: --- CLCTB ---
lines.description: --- CLCTB ---
lines.flavor: --- CLCTB ---

lines.name: Dull Ember
lines.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 1 at the Forge.
lines.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

lines.name: Flickering Ember
lines.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 2 at the Forge.
lines.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

lines.name: Shining Ember
lines.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 3 at the Forge.
lines.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

lines.name: Radiant Ember
lines.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 4 at the Forge.
lines.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

lines.name: Luminescent Ember
lines.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 5 at the Forge.
lines.flavor: At Refinement Level 5, it will be raised to the next tier.

lines.name: Void Ember
lines.description: Upgrades an item directly to Refinement Level 6 at the Forge.

lines.name: Treasure Map
lines.description: Discovers a treasure chest.

lines.name: Reagents
lines.description: Strange liquid with unknown effects.

lines.name: Tool Kit
lines.description: A useful set of tools, that can be used to upgrade an item.

lines.name: Tarot Card
lines.description: A card with a disturbing image upon it.

lines.name: Flower
lines.description: A flower in full bloom. An exceedingly rare sight in the Necrovale.

lines.name: God's Eye
lines.description: The eye of a forgotten God, whose body was scattered.

lines.name: Barbed Key
lines.description: A strange key that pricks you when turned.

lines.name: Skeletal Key
lines.description: Human remains, fashioned into a macabre tool.

lines.name: Bug Net
lines.description: If you find this item, you found a bug. Please report what you were up to. Thanks! You can trade this to The Coward for a small reward.
lines.flavor: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.

lines.name: --- BLESS ---
lines.description: --- BLESS ---
lines.flavor: --- BLESS ---

lines.name: --- BLESS ---
lines.description: --- BLESS ---
lines.flavor: --- BLESS ---

lines.name: --- BLESS ---
lines.description: --- BLESS ---
lines.flavor: --- BLESS ---

lines.name: Blessing of Warmth
lines.description: Your max Health is increased.

lines.name: Wisdom of Wind
lines.description: With this Wisdom, you move more quickly.

lines.name: Wisdom of Rain
lines.description: With this Wisdom, you find more coins.

lines.name: Wisdom of Stone
lines.description: With this Wisdom, your defense is increased.

lines.name: Wisdom of Seeds
lines.description: With this Wisdom, you find more Embers.

lines.name: Wisdom of Fire
lines.description: With this Wisdom, you do more damage.

lines.name: Blessing of Hope
lines.description: With this blessing, you recieve more Crystals of Hope.

lines.name: Blessing of Faith
lines.description: With this blessing, you gain more Hope.

lines.name: Flameseeker's Oath
lines.description: With this blessing, you find more Embers.

lines.name: Mutt's Spirit
lines.description: The fiesty spirit of a Mutt who fights for survival.

lines.name: Curse of the Witch
lines.description: With this curse, you deal more damage, but gain less Hope.

lines.name: Curse of Sorrow
lines.description: With this curse, your attack speed is lessened.

lines.name: --- ENEMY ---
lines.description: --- ENEMY ---
lines.flavor: --- ENEMY ---

lines.name: --- ENEMY ---
lines.description: --- ENEMY ---
lines.flavor: --- ENEMY ---

lines.name: --- ENEMY ---
lines.description: --- ENEMY ---
lines.flavor: --- ENEMY ---

lines.name: Gut Cutter
lines.description: Barbed sword, designed to entangle with the intestines.
lines.flavor: Do your guts hang low, can you tie them in a bow?

lines.name: Belittler
lines.flavor: Designed to tear at your spirit, making you feel small and foolish.

lines.name: --- IDEAS ---
lines.description: --- IDEAS ---
lines.flavor: --- IDEAS ---

lines.name: --- IDEAS ---
lines.description: --- IDEAS ---
lines.flavor: --- IDEAS ---

lines.name: --- IDEAS ---
lines.description: --- IDEAS ---
lines.flavor: --- IDEAS ---

lines.name: Empyrean Blade
lines.description: Sends forth beautiful waves of light.
lines.flavor: Reminiscent of a field of grain in autumn.

lines.name: Firedancer's Lantern
lines.description: Send out waves of fire around yourself.
lines.flavor: Great for a performance too.

lines.name: Butane Lung
lines.description: Breath fire ahead.
lines.flavor: Scarring of the lungs and windpipe common.

lines.name: Necrocommand Staff
lines.description: Reanimate a nearby enemy to fight for you.

lines.name: Shepherd's Staff
lines.description: Turn enemies into sheep.
lines.flavor: Makes a great food source, if you don't think too hard about what you're eating.

lines.name: Thorny Staff
lines.description: Turn your own blood into projectiles.

lines.name: Goo Blaster
lines.description: Melts enemies with acidic slime.
lines.flavor: "Maybe we can piece him back together!"

lines.name: Deck of Cards
lines.description: Throw playing cards at enemies. Aces do extra damage.
lines.flavor: Death on the River.

lines.name: Glass Cannon
lines.description: Fire glass shards at enemies. Destroyed when you die.
lines.flavor: "We're only gonna get one shot at this..."

lines.name: Staff of Banishment
lines.description: Open a portal which pulls nearby enemies into another dimension.

lines.name: Staff of Divine Cleansing
lines.description: Damage enemies in accordance with how sinful they were in life.
lines.flavor: Let them look upon the face of their ancestors and falter.

lines.name: Mark of Shame
lines.description: Draws the gaze of an ancient evil.
lines.flavor: -Everything is on fire. all other lights go out. powerful demon enemies spawn-

lines.name: Electro Wave
lines.description: Sends out electric sparks that crawl across the ground.

lines.name: Cat's Eye Staff
lines.description: Hurls fireballs up into the air.

lines.name: Oak Feller
lines.description: Holds a spinning blade in front of yourself.
lines.flavor: Only meant for cutting trees. Do not use this for anything else.

lines.name: Bladed Claw
lines.description: A set of blades fashioned to a metal wrist-wrap.
lines.flavor: Best not to get an itch while wearing them.

lines.name: Beam Staff
lines.description: A staff that releases an intense beam of energy.
lines.flavor: One evil eye sits atop the staff, destroying all it beholds.

lines.name: Keeley's Struggle
lines.description: Hold your attack to empower your shot with bitterness.
lines.flavor: Keeley learned that life is nothing but struggle, only resolved by death.

lines.name: Ball and Chain
lines.description: Tether yourself to a spiked ball.
lines.flavor: There is a price to pay for the chains you refuse.

lines.name: Irrational Abacus
lines.description: All chain effects are doubled.

lines.name: Weeping Shield
lines.description: When you evade an attack, damage all nearby enemies.
lines.flavor: Suffering frozen into steel.

lines.name: Jellyfish
lines.description: A large jellyfish follows you around adoringly.

lines.name: Barrier Shield
lines.description: Projects a protective barried in front of you.

lines.name: Caltrops
lines.description: Damages and slows enemies who talk through them.

lines.name: Clatterbang
lines.description: Activate to attract attention.

lines.name: Hookshot
lines.description: Shoot out a barbed hook to either move yourself along, or pull something towards you.

lines.name: Electrostatic Web
lines.description: Nearby enemies become stuck together.
lines.flavor: What grows together, dies together.

lines.name: Wind Spear
lines.description: Does no damage, but knocks back enemies in front of you with the power of wind.
lines.flavor: Tap into the secret currents in the sea of air.

lines.name: Tomo's Bell
lines.description: Ringing the Bell draws in all nearby Enemies.
lines.flavor: It's said that the Ringing can only be heard by the wicked.

lines.name: Hypnotic Panpipes
lines.flavor: The melody never seems to begin, and never seems to end.

lines.name: Targe
lines.description: Evade oncoming attacks.
lines.flavor: Often painted with the symbols of the ancient highland clans.

lines.name: Repulsion Totem
lines.description: All nearby enemies are pushed away.
lines.flavor: A familiar feeling to you.

lines.name: Singularity
lines.description: Create a singularity, drawing in all enemies.
lines.flavor: Atomic intimacy.

lines.name: Boar's Shield
lines.description: Defends while active, and charges when dropped.
lines.flavor: The symbol of the Boar strengthens the resolve of men charging to their death.

lines.name: Mirror Shield
lines.description: Reflects projectiles back at their source.
lines.flavor: When you attack someone, the last thing you want to see is your own reflection.

lines.name: Teleporation Staff
lines.description: Teleports you to the desired location.

lines.name: Time Turner
lines.description: Activate to slow down time.
lines.flavor: Do not stretch time too thin. Those who wait between are watching.

lines.name: Goat Horns
lines.flavor: Bring them to the Bacchanalia.

lines.name: Scarecrow Hat
lines.description: Standing still disguises you from enemies.
lines.flavor: Don't stand for too long... one can lose themselves in being nothing.

lines.name: Spirit Bear's Hide
lines.description: You may equip a weapon in your offhand.
lines.flavor: The preserved hide of a great beast, long gone from this world.

lines.name: Stormeyes
lines.description: Enemies are pulled into your melee attacks.
When you evade an attack, you move faster.

lines.name: Clumsy Heavy Boots
lines.description: When you bump into an enemy, you damage them.
lines.flavor: "I'm just gonna squeeze by ya." - Last thing heard before expiration

lines.name: Moonshoes
lines.description: Your melee attacks become jumping attacks.
lines.flavor: Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which ne never shows to anybody.

lines.name: Frostbite Amulet
lines.description: Frozen enemies die with an explosion of freezing shards.

lines.name: Demonfire Pendant
lines.flavor: The cost of use is enormous.

lines.name: Penitent Psalm
lines.flavor: Truth begins with humility. Contentment begins with truth.

lines.name: The Book of The Father
lines.description: Your attacks have more range.
lines.flavor: A beautiful oral tradition of warriors, made vulgar by its translation.

lines.name: Puzzle Cube
lines.description: All item drops are higher level.
lines.flavor: The value is not in completing it, but in trying.

lines.name: Cynic's Manifesto
lines.description: Despair consumes you.
lines.flavor: Truth can be taken too far.

lines.name: Ghostly Mantle
lines.description: When you attack with a melee weapon, ghostly copies of yourself join in on the fun.
lines.flavor: When you wear the mantle, you can feel your ego dissolving.

lines.name: Rune of the Dog
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, you gain a small amount of health.
lines.flavor: A wolf brought low by man.

lines.name: Rune of the Cat
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, you gain power faster.
lines.flavor: Still in possession of its predatory instincts.

lines.name: Rune of the Slug
lines.description: While sitting in your inventory, potions are more effective.
lines.flavor: Lowly but vital.

lines.name: Rune of the Beetle
lines.description: Your damage is slightly increased.
lines.flavor: Industrious and prolific.

lines.name: Turpentine
lines.description: Massively reduces damage taken for a short while.

lines.name: Beefsteak
lines.description: Your attacks will send enemies flying, for a time.

lines.name: Flask of Mead
lines.description: Gets you drunk.

items.text: Design and Programming - Casey Clyde
Music - Svyatoslav Petrov, Andrea Baroni
Publishing - Alex Poysky, Victor Garcia Montero
Marketing - Mauro Junqueira
Special Thanks:
My wife, Camille - For endless love, support, and baked goods
My mentor, Jason Rohrer - For sharing his wellspring of experience and wisdom
My friends, Lyle & Matt Underwood - For their enthusiasm and consistently excellent ideas
You - For generously trusting my game with your limited time
The Isolated Games team, Francesc Romero, Iago Silva, Daniel Oliver, Alberto Hernandez, for their beautiful art
Additional art from Diogo Rocha Goncalves, Winton Afric, Ze Osmar, Thomas Feichtmeir, Szadi art, sanctumpixel, ChevyRay
Nicolas Cannasse and the Haxe/Heaps.io team for making awesome technology
Sebastien Benard of Deepnight Games, for sharing his vast knowledge and resources
Austin East for making Echo, a great physics library
Yanrishatum, ZwodahS, Spitko,  and the entire Haxe Discord server for their generous help
Robert Dorigo, gary D. Pryor, and Kevin O'Neill for their relentless playtesting and deep ARPG knowledge
Kulning by Elvya Dulcimer
Aggydaggy -- I just like made game

Thanks for trying out my demo. Purchasing the full version will allow you to continue on with your current game. The game is in early access, so there are many more items, NPCs, levels, and enemies in the works.
The area you are entering is still in Early Access. You can keep playing, just please note that I am working hard on adding more variety, balance, and fun. Thanks for understanding!
Your corpse shall rot in the pits of the Necrovale, joining the countless ranks of undead.
You died as you lived-- useless, pathetic, and anonymous.
You fall to the ground, dead. Your corpse rots on the ground, adding to the dungeon's miasma of foul air.
Your endless complaining has finally ceased, as the last breath leaves your body.
You die, and your corpse is dragged off by giant centipedes, adding its bloated mass to their larder.
Your fragile shell is shredded into nothingness by the unthinking masses of dead.
Your inevitable death is upon you at long last.
You have finally been freed from the prison of your own life.
Your body gives up the fight, joining your mind in utter defeat.
A thousand generations of your ancestors wail as you squander their efforts.
The insects and the mold eagerly take claim on your flesh.
Your meaningless, unlived life has been mercifully ended.
You have finally found where you belong: shambling with the endless undead horde.
The masses of undead gleefully rip the flesh from your hide.
An image of futility and pointlessness becomes clear in your mind, as your life drains away.
The burden of living has been graciously lifted from you.
The untold story of your life comes to a tiresome and pointless conculsion.
Your insignificant life comes to a humiliating end.
A meaningless death perfectly complements a meaningless life.
Some have a cause they live, die, and kill for. You have none of those.
The futility of your situation dawns on your dull mind far too late.
You have found purpose at last: as fodder for the rats and insects.
Awaken, and listen, for I am the father of your father. The Father of all...
And you, unloved, unknown, least of my sons. A Stranger to this world.
It is you I have chosen to tear this tired world apart.
Hold fast, for your ordeal is only beginning...
Your courage is admirable, my son. But the river of fate only flows one way.
Your fate lies in the Necrovale. Go forth, with the gift of those who run...
Your rebellion is futile. Succumb to your fate, only then may you rise above it.
Your persistence is madness. But madness in a mad world is no sin.
Take one final gift, and continue onwards....
Rise, my son. Your ordeal is well underway.
For nine days and nine nights I hanged, sacrificing myself to myself.
Remember this. You too were born to suffer. This is your path.
You have done well, my son. Your actions here make me proud.
But the journey must come to a close... for now.
It brings me great pride to watch you, my son.
You've shattered the first seal of the Necrovale. The Seal of Arrogance.
It kept many bold and confident men in bondage...
They will serve me well in the quest to tear this world down...
I am behind you, son, breathing purpose into your quest.
The Seal of Greed is no more. It held down great men of ambition and vision.
I will remake this world into what it was meant to be.
The truth of nature will emerge from the winter of mans hubris.
Every day, you work to prove yourself as my hand in that lightless realm.
The Seal of Ire dimmed the passionate flames of humanity.
I created you to be passionate, wild, violent, and true.
The absence of such things is an insult.
I've been watching you...
The pathetic moment I've been waiting for has arrived...
You've seen the truth of it all, and come crashing down in your despair.
Pay my price, or stay here forever with me... I'll be waiting...
What an eager little stripling we have here...
There is no rush, we will be intimately acquainted soon enough...
Welcome back little one... still struggling against your fate?
Oh... I'm starting to think you just like playing with me...
What have you brought me this time my precious little one...
My favorite little piglet returns... bearing gifts I hope?
Oh how I've missed you my pet...
You know your despair sustains me, my succulent little piglet.
I've simply longed for your return... The despair is wafting off of you.
You pathetic worm, how dare you try and cheat me of what is mine...
You disgusting, greedy little piglet, trying to cheat me of my fun?
You wouldn't dare try to keep my hands off you, right?
Let this be a gentle lesson my pet. Never disobey me again.
Oh I could do so much worse to you, piglet. I could turn you inside out ten thousand times.
You disgusting little worm, do you never learn? You are mine, and will obey me.
Oh, you think you're very clever...
You'll be back. They always come back to me...
What is this? You come to me with nothing to give?
You pathetic worm. You small, insignificant, disgusting little piglet!
I will enjoy roasting you slowly over a spit.
Mmm, watching you struggle and fail is so deliciously entertaining...
Please never stop, my little piglet... It feels so good...
It feels as though the statue is calling out to you...
Prisoner... step forward and approach. Bring me your papers so we can begin.
Let's see here... hmm... yes... quite the litany of charges. Alright.
These crimes you've committed, they tear at the threads of our world, the fabric of which is wearing thin.
So by my ancestral authority, I, Grand Arbiter Diggerswitch Uppsatani XVII, do cast the following judgement...
You are banished into the Necrovale.
You will be fashioned with a phial of vital essence, and a phial of cyanide. You may choose your path.
I hope you choose redemption. May you redeem us all.
So you have chosen a coward's death.
I expected more... Even a criminal can choose to die with dignity.
There is no dignity in running from the fate you've created for yourself. Return to me.
A futile and idiotic gesture.
It serves as a perfect summation of your life thus far.
Bring me your papers.
Your judgement is absolute. Your spirit can never ascend from this miserable place.
We've arrived...
This is where our path ends, and yours begins in earnest.
Beyond that bridge is the Necrovale, the realm of the dead.
When you cross the bridge, do not look back. You no longer belong to this world.
The Necrovale is a place of endless despair. Hope is a scarce commodity.
To enter, you will have to sacrifice your last vestige of hope. Only the hopeless may enter.
Take this, prisoner. The Father preserve you...
Don't make our work difficult... ok... Your destination is ahead, in the Necrovale.
Death or despair, make your choice and go forth.
We got another runner... ehh... alright. Here we go.
Huh... that was quick.
Well, let's toss his carcass into the Necrovale.
Do that again and things will go badly for you, Stranger.
Welcome, child... You've come to challenge the order of things?
It takes profound arrogance to destroy what you do not understand.
The cost is greater than you realize. The Father preserve you...
You've not the first to try. You won't be the last. Shall we?
Are you willing to pay the cost? If not, don't bother.
Another lost child, wandering in the cold...
You are where you belong, of course. Only a fool fights their fate...
Welcome back, Stranger. I wish peace upon you... in death.
Many have come to challenge me in my long years... you did not think you were the first, did you?
The fortunate among us are humbled by life's cruel lessons.
Let me be the one to teach you just such a lesson...
Many ages ago, I was like you. Arrogant, proud, innocent.
I believed I could reshape the world to my liking...
Now you must learn what I did... humble yourself before the edifice of this world.
It's over... I am relieved from the endless struggles of this world.
I truly mourn you, Stranger. For your struggles have only just begun...
Look around you... these ruins were once a great civilization. I was there at the beginning, and I saw every bit of their undoing.
Your own fall will be no different. One thousand small mistakes accumulating in a humiliating defeat.
Finally... a challenge...
Hmm yes, you will go far. Much, much too far.
You share a grisly fate with all those who desire too much.
Another lost soul, setting foot where they should not set foot...
Your problems are your own now. And my problems are no more...
Please help me, Stranger... I can't do this alone.
Thank you, Stranger. Please take this...
You are a light in the darkness, Stranger...
Ominous things are ahead. Together, we might survive.
Another test is upon us. Survival is our cause.
I hear the Hopeless approaching. Stand fast.
On your guard. They approach...
Couldn't have done it without you, Stranger.
Not bad, Stranger, not bad.
Good looking out. Stay sharp out there...
You might have a chance out there.
The Necrovale hasn't taken us yet, huh?
We survived another fight. That's all you can ask for.
She's gone... It was all for nothing...
Please... Don't take it... It's all I have...
You're just another monster, creeping through the darkness.
Hmmm... yes... I can sense it within you...
A desire for something sacred and beautiful. You seek embers, just as I do.
It is said that they are the unfulfilled passions of those who have passed away. The stronger the passion, the brighter it burns.
Take with you the oath of my order, that your own passions may bear fruit.
Normally I'd gut you from tip to tail. But we got bigger issues now...
Oi, it's the Stranger. I'll have your ass another day. Today, we fight to survive.
On guard you roach, we aren't sure to survive this.
Heh heh heh... I'll be havin' that.
The Mutt looks like he has been through many tough battles, but there is still a friendly gleam in his eye.
The Mutt looks calm and poised, ready for the challenges ahead.
The Mutt yawns and stretches, preparing his body for the fight.
*Bark*
The Mutt barks and pants. He will live to see another day.
You feel inspired by his scrappy spirit.
Please... I don't know where I am. I don't know what to do. I'm scared. Please help me.
I'm in a great deal of danger. Please, I don't want to die. I'm very scared right now.
Please don't let these Cretins bash my head in. I only want to live for one more day, it's all I ask.
I'm very scared. Please help me. I don't know what to do. I'm weak.
Eh heh heh... I guess it all worked out in the end.
Ah, wasn't so bad after all. Heh...
Hm, you helped a bit I guess. Wasn't anything to worry about after all.
Was that it?
What am I doing here... What a waste. I lost everything...
It was just jealousy, nothing more. That's what they don't tell you.
They love your success until it surpasses their own.
Oh, another lost soul has washed ashore on our little island.
Sorry to say, but it's no better than the ocean of hopelessness out there.
There's no escape I'm afraid, no hope, and certainly no point.
Ah, rebuked by the Necrovale again. Get used to it.
It's a harsh place, that will destroy anyone who is unprepared.
Hope fallen out, huh? I've been there. Hell, I'm there now.
All you can do is let yourself be flattened, and wait it out.
Something's wrong...
There's a change happening, I feel it in the pit of my stomach.
Ho! Stranger! I found some new items. Come have a look.
Oh, thank you...
This moping and whining is more than a little pointless.
I lost everything when I was sent here. It seems that they love your success until it surpasses their own.
Maybe I can rebuild... Thanks Stranger. I have a few items I can sell, take a look.
Hey... watch it would you? The Father preserve me...
You know what? Just leave me alone.
Just... piss off for a while. Ok?
Oh... thank you Stranger.
There's no sense in sitting around moping, I guess.
I lost everything when I was sent here, but I suppose I can sell a few trinkets. What's the harm? Have a look.
Ah, thanks. It's kind but... a bit strange.
No matter, I need to keep moving forward. You're right.
For your kindness, I can be a little more generous with my prices.
I don't know where you get it from... but we all need it. So, thanks.
We're here, we're not going anywhere, so let's make the best of it. Right?
I've been working to expand my stock a bit. Check it out, you might see something ya like.
My friend! He delivers as usual. Good stuff. Here we go... oh yeah...
Hey this is between us... but I have been building up a secret stash of items... Only for my elite clientele, you see.
For a little bit of money, I can show you the secret stash. Hey, you're my favorite client.
Hey, I know I can't really repay all your kindness.
When I was sent here, it was like a nightmare I couldn't wake up from.
But with your help, I've been able to build something I'm proud of.
Please take this. It's my most precious possession.
Found a few tchotchkes, take what you want. For a price, of course...
Have a look, have a look. The shop is shaping up, thanks to you.
Oh here he comes... sure you still want that discount?
More items for me, more gold in your pocket. Everyone wins, see.
Welcome back, friend. If there's anything I can do, anything at all, just ask...
If you hold your nose, this stuff really isn't too bad. Cheers.
A toast to our health, prosperity, and great fortune in being sent here.
Oh, you have a sick sense of humor. Very funny.
Oh bless you, this will put some wind in my sails.
Hmm, I can't really sell something like this. There's no market for it. Thanks anyway.
I was next to Godhood in my ability, Stranger...
Things far too esoteric for you to possibly understand.
Jealous, fearful, petty-minded men sent me here. Bah.
Take a potion if you must. Doubt you can appreciate what went into them, however.
Don't confuse me with that pathetic Merchant. My cause is noble.
Hurry up donkey. Take what you need and leave.
Buy what you need and leave. I'm very busy, you dead-eyed cretin.
My loyal assistant. My work continues, thanks to you.
Ahh, this will suffice. I may yet be able to begin my work...
Such a good little dog, I should throw you a treat.
A small discount is in order for your work.
My donkey returns, bearing gifts again. You should be thankful I'm helping you.
All the filthy peasants here should be on their knees worshipping me.
All my stock will be of a higher level now. It is quite impressive.
Another tribute offered up. I never got this sort of respect outside of the Necrovale.
It's about time someone recognized the brilliant genius of a mind on fire.
My repetoire of options is expanded. Use them in service.
You are my most trusted pet, loyal and obedient. So few are these days.
While you muck about, doing whatever it is you do, I have been here unraveling the secrets of the universe.
This potion I've made for you should keep you scurrying about.
I must admit... I underestimated you. That fact that you've survived this long is a minor miracle.
Your contributions to a greater cause have been... significant.
Here, take these. They were of value to me... perhaps they will be of value to you.
What is the meaning of this, you blundering buffoon?
Get out of my sight before I unleash myself upon you.
Begone from my sight at once, you half-wit nincompoop.
Psh, a crude ingredient. Nevertheless, a distillate has a few useful properties.
Hmm, I suppose this will serve as an adequate base.
Ah, very good. This will prove useful, I'm certain.
My line of work is not to feed your addictions, donkey.
What is this asinine nonsense? A flower? This has no bearing on my work.
I have no need of this trash, quit wasting my time.
This is all wrong... I shouldn't be here...
I don't belong here... Please, I swear, make them see... I'm a good man...
If you don't slaughter me I will trade you items... please...
Ah... ouch... owwie... ahh.. gah...
I don't blame you. Beat me, spit on me, laugh at me. Why not?
Please don't hurt me anymore... I'm sorry.
It's a strange place to find a bit of kindness...
I'm still alive. I must remember that...
Hey look, I really need some gear. I really don't need so much money, it's ok.
