Ah, oh, it's you. Sorry if I'm in your way. You look angry, did I do something?
Please don't do anything to me. From now on I'll give you the same type of item back, ok?
It's too much here, I can't handle it. I don't know what I'm going to do.
Look, if you don't tell anyone I'm here, I swear, I'll only give you items of the same Refinement Level. Please help...
This place is horrible. I can't take much more.
You are so right to be disgusted with me. You might as well spit on me and beat me, go ahead. I know you want to.
Are you disgusted with me? I'm sorry. I will make sure what I give you is the same rarity as what you give me.
Stranger, you're the only one here I can trust.
You're my lifeline. If you weren't here... I don't know what would become of me.
Please... take this. It's kept my worthless hide alive. I can only imagine what it will do for you.
Please don't bring up my behavior, I'm ashamed.
You'd be amazed what you can find on the dead here.
I've scrounged up a few items. Like a vulture, I guess.
I can't fight like you... It's pathetic, I know.
I've been picking through the carcasses of the dead. It's sick work.
This might make things go blurry for a little while. Thanks...
I suppose this will keep me going for a while. For whatever that's worth.
You're probably right. I'd be better off this way. I'm not brave enough to drink it though.
This stuff only makes the nightmares worse.
Oh wow... It's been a while since I've seen one of these. I used to like smelling them in the spring...
Now you've made me sad. I'm sorry.
Oh, I don't know what to do with this. But I'll keep it for later, might need it. Thanks.
...I thought you were nice...
...Leave... Please...
Please, don't look at me...
I think... you're kind...
Oh... it's you... I think about you...
You've come back... I'm smiling, on the inside...
Please... keep this. I hope you think of me... sometimes...
No... I can't...
...Thank you...
Oh... is this what you think of me?
No... I shouldn't...
...Thank you... This makes my heart smile...
You're kind... and gentle...
I don't deserve this...
It's beautiful... Please, don't look at me right now...
Kindness is rare here... Thank you.
I love it...
Who are you, and what do you want? Because of course, you want something from me.
You damn ungrateful people, all you think about is yourselves. Me, me, me. Bah.
You want to pay for a meld on your gloves or boots? Fine. Otherwise, piss off.
Look what you've done. You damned fool, what is wrong with you?
I ought to bash your stupid head in for doing that.
Piss off before I crack you open like an egg.
Great, suppose you want some thanks now.
Well you ain't getting it.
I can meld your armor and helmet now, if you can pay of course. That's it.
Oh here we go again with the hope. Oh, thank you kind sir. You are the hero. You're the best. Happy now?
Let me meld your books and runes! Why not! Want the shirt off my back while you're at it?
Now, what, I'm supposed to owe you or something?
Yeah right. Just more work for me to do, I guess.
At least now I can meld your amulets.
Your people pillage and plunder mine for hundreds of years, and you think a bit of hope will make up for it?
Your world, even this place, was built by my people. Never have I heard a thanks, never have I felt any gratitude. Bah.
Want to see just what sort of craftsmen we are? I can meld weapons and offhands now. Your people could never achieve such a thing.
Alright, fine... Enough... You're not the worst person I've ever met.
You have helped, somewhat. Ok? Thank you. Ok? Is that enough?
Take this for your trouble I guess. It helped me when I was a green little rook like you.
Yeah yeah, I'm busy. Make it quick.
You think I got time to stand around and talk all day? Make it quick.
Yeah, cut right in. I don't mind. I wasn't working on anything important.
Hands are hurting, back is hurting, hearing is going, feet are hurting. It never ends.
Well, we're both still kicking. We'll just keep on until we can't, I guess.
Oh what, do you think all my kind just drink likker all day? I should crack you open like a crawdad.
I don't need this trash, I feel perfectly healthy. Begone.
You're trash, you know that? Get the hell outta my face.
Ah, you're a coca junkie. That explains a lot.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha... oh this is great...
The lad's going around pasing out flowers now! Bah hah ha haa..
What is this, show and tell? I've no use for this.
Heh heh heh... you can feel it... can't you?
Moment by moment, the despair building and growing... feeding on you like a leech...
Only a matter of time before it becomes too much and you lose it...
Heh heh heh... no one is immune from this place... No one escapes...
Yeah, you think you're better than me... Heh heh heh... you'll be just like me soon enough.
Why fight the suffering? Heh heh... no point... just go with the flow.
Yeah, you're trying now. Soon enough you'll give up, just like I did.
Welcome to my place, sorry I don't have a cheese platter for you... HEH HEH HEH HEH HEH HEH!!!
There's no point in trying really... just give up and live in your own filth. Works for me! Heh heh heh...
Your kindness is quite wasted here, my friend!
I laugh at hope. It is nothing but a mirage in the desert of life.
Plus, living in your own filth and misery is more fun! Heh heh heh...
I am perfectly content here, thank you very much.
Perhaps you are in the cell, and I am free. Have you considered that?
The world is nothing but a stage play, and I seem to be the lone audience member.
There's no use in usefulness, there's no joy in joy, there's no hope when you're hoping.
The universe will have it's way with us, no matter what we do.
So we might as well give up... right?
Ah, you again.
What a mess I've made of this life.
I'm just a filthy old man with nothing.
Leave me be.
Bah ha ha, hope is but a joke. The punchline will find you soon.
Go fetch some gold, like a pig rooting for mushrooms.
We are all swine, and I thank The Father for that!
You don't see it by now? Bah hah heh he he...
You aren't trying to save me, you're trying to save yourself. Must I dance along?
Go grab a potion. It will only prolong the inevitable, thus prolonging my entertainment.
Hope, hope, hope. Why must you pester me so? Can you not see I am content?
If you're so desperate to play your part, fine, go get some equipment.
It's really quite pathetic, your obsession.
I don't know why, but when you come here it causes me great dread.
What is it about you and your asinine quest of hope that so disturbs me?
Go into the cell across from me... you will find the wasted remains of a man far greater than yourself.
If his life was for nothing, what makes you think your own is not?
You made it through... Still resolved as ever... It's unbelievable.
I suppose my last defense is gone. I'm just a tired, dirty old man who squandered his life.
I have nothing, and thought I was happy that way. But in secret, I've carried one thing this whole time.
Call it the small ember of a fire that died long ago. You should take it, perhaps giving it to you is the only meaningful thing I will ever do.
The only thing left to do is free myself from the cage of my own design...
Freedom... It's hard to describe how I feel... I've wasted so much time...
My new life is just beginning...
Welcome Stranger, to my garden. All are welcome here.
It's only the beginnings of a beginning. The land here is foul and bitter.
But with consistent tending, applied patiently over a long period of time...
It will take patience for this land to heal. But I believe in what I'm doing.
Onwards we go. Only comparing today to yesterday. Never comparing today to tomorrow.
The plants don't feel time the way we do. We must slow down to meet them, and never try to rush them to meet us.
Slowly, carefully, the land is healing. If we move in the right direction each day, we will eventually reach our goal.
With careful tending, the garden of our lives will begin bearing the fruit of beauty and truth.
The greatest spoils are right there in front of us, waiting for us to reach out and touch them.
The first crop is... not great. The despair of this place has seeped into the soil.
The crop is improving. That's all I need to see. Gradual improvement over a long period of time...
You must admit, this crop is better than the last. Just imagine what it might be like in the future.
Perhaps with this crop, you won't make such a disgusted face when you eat it.
The first glimmers of beauty emerge... please, try it.
A wonder of nature's creation, in full bloom. Nothing is better.
Thank you, Stranger. Hope is merely the ability to clearly envision a better future.
It's far from perfect, but I would like you to see the result of that hope. Try this.
What can we do today that will make it better than yesterday? That's the question we must always be asking.
The hope you share has borne fruit. Please, try it.
Patience and humility are the nutrients in the soil of our lives. A delicate sapling of joy might one day grow into a mighty oak.
Please, share with me the fruit of our labors.
Now we are beginning to see real results. When you tend your garden well, joy is not happenstance, but the renewable fruit of living.
Subtlety and depth are taking root in our produce. Please enjoy.
It is the journey that makes the joy. The betterment is the fruit, not the betterness.
Because of that, there is a tinge of melancholy in what I present to you: a perfected product of the garden.
Long have I sat, motionless, pondering...
A sailor on the infinite ocean. Much wisdom I have accrued.
Speak with me, and I will impart the blessings of my wisdom upon you.
Violence is the language of pain, begetting its own dark dialog.
A fish is twitching and flopping on the ground.
A wildflower seed is blown over sand and stone, coming to rest in the damp soil.
The eye of The Father fixates on you, for a moment, and then looks away.
To want is to suffer. And to live is to want.
In my dreams I have seen the monsters bred for lack of want.
I bow my head to you. Let this wisdom accompany you for a while.
Without struggle, life unravels into nothingness.
Love your struggle, tend to it. Treat it as though it truly matters.
May this wisdom shield you, for a time.
Remember the struggle of your father. And the struggle of his father.
Going back, all the way, is an endless story. You are only a small part.
May this wisdom guide you on your way.
Do not fear the end of the world.
The world was meant to be destroyed, and created again.
May this wisdom steel you in your sacred task.
We will all die. But what a rarity it is to be alive at all.
Most things that might have existed, never have.
The Father praise you. Let this wisdom carry you.
The past is the mother of the future. Always birthing itself.
Hope is an umbilicus, stretching from the one to the other.
Your gift is well recieved. Please, take this wisdom with you.
You were built for despair. It's no coincidence that you can feel it.
Our emotions are an ancestral logic, with reasoning too nuanced for us to grasp.
Don't fight it, feel it. And take with you this gift of wisdom.
A fool would say that nothing matters, that the universe is ambivalent to us.
Everything is connected, therefore everything matters.
Your generosity is seen. Please, carry this wisdom with you on your journey.
There is nothing to learn. Everything you need to know has always been within you.
Our only task is to clear away the distractions, lies, and mislearnings.
The world is watching you, and waiting. Let this wisdom remind you.
The Wheel of Life has been spinning since the beginning.
It will spin when you are gone, and when all you know is gone.
Someday the world will be too strange to understand.
Keep this with you, a final gift.
A fish is twitching and flopping on the ground.
A wildflower seed is blown over sand and stone, coming to rest in the damp soil.
You've been walking through a dark forest, but ahead is a familiar cabin.
A silent bell rings out, echoing the song in your heart.
It's early morning, and the sun refuses to rise. You can feel the world spinning.
Your friends are all together, in embrace beyond propriety.
The Goddess is wet with sunlight, and stretching herself out into the morning.
The eye of The Father fixates on you, for a moment, and then looks away.
A strange orb in the infinite darkness, spinning freely.
It's a lot easier to be gone, than it is to be here.
The trappings of possession hold little interest to me.
Don't fool yourself, Stranger, we are here because we belong here.
Our crime was our birth. To the Father, we are equal to the dust we came from.
We are not the heroes of this story... just witnesses to the uncaring machinery of the cosmos.
Oh no... you look like you're going to try and convince me this matters. Please don't bother.
Yeah... I'm done. Time to draw the curtains and be done with this mess.
No one is to blame but me. I made a dog's breakfast out of this life.
Ah, what a mess. Well, to be honest I don't think I ever really had a chance.
I can't wait to be done with it all. Please hurry up with that Cyanide.
What are you talking to me for? I have nothing worth saying. No final wisdom to impart. Nothing.
My life began as nothing, and will end the same way. How poetical.
Yeah yeah, I don't really care anymore. I just want to end it as soon as possible.
Think they can sentence me to the Necrovale? I'll show them.
I guess life truly is a joke. Now it's time for the punchline.
Oh finally, you brought me the Cyanide. It's about time.
My final words are just... It's not worth playing a game you can't win.
Bottoms up! Cheers to good health and good fortune.
A flower? What a pathetic gesture. Do you not realize we are in Hell?
Flowers again... What sort of deluded imbecile bothers with flowers down here? What a sick joke.
Another flower. Why? I can't make any sense of this. It's utterly useless.
If this is some asinine attempt at changing me mind, don't bother. I've make my choice.
Oh what, are you expecting a big thank you? You want me to get on my knees and have some big revelation?
Oh Father, here we go again. More flowers.
I have to admit, I've never in my life seen someone so persistent with such a worthless activity.
There it is, only a matter of time. Let me ask you something...
How do you find the energy to keep up with this? What's the point?
All roads lead to one place, why fight against it?
Right on time, another flower. This is ridiculous. You are ridiculous.
I have no idea what sort of blind, idiotic compulsion drives you. But I admit I am impressed.
Is that it? Is that your secret? Just trying? Even if it's futile, even if it leads nowhere, even if it amounts to nothing?
How do you keep that up? I don't get it. I just don't. I wish I did.
It's all so tiresome...
You know what...
Forget this. Ha ha ha ha ha...
If we are all going to the same place, why not go there in style?
From now on, I'm following you. Let's go into the darkness screaming, kicking, and fighting with every ounce of our beings.
Father, I feel like my soul is on fire. And before it burns up, I'm gonna rip this world to shreds.
AAIAIAIAIAIAIAIAIAIA!!!!!!!
I have absolutely no use for this trash. Get me Cyanide.
The cat silently watches and judges you.
He seems to be expecting a gift.
The cat purrs and accepts your gift. You have been judged favorably.
The cat looks briefly at your gift, then looks away, displeased. You have been judged unfavorably.
The cat senses a deep neediness within you, and looks at you with disgust.
Why have you come here, Stranger... to mock my captivity?
I've seen what you've done... I've seen what you are...
I've seen it all and I won't forget...
No... I'm not dead...
But by the Father I wish I was.
Just let me lie here. Or kill me, it means nothing.
Do not give me such bitter medicine.
My journey is into darkness. Your gesture only delays and obstructs me.
My longe yeeres of emprisonement ben naught moore than grain rottynge in a sylowe.
Light is gon fro me, fer and fade in myn mynde.
Wolde ye seke a bright and flikeryng thyng, and yiven it frely?
I recalle the peyne, I felte al that they inflicted upon hemself.
Wolde ye seke somwhat of rere bewte, and yiven it frely?
Myn owene historie hath been ylost to me, The Fadir hath me foryeten.
The remembraunce is ylost in a myrour. Wolde ye seke it?
Wolde ye yiven your lyf, so that myn owene flikeryng flamme myghte nat be quenched?
Many hath fallyn, in lyte of hwich I once radyate, in lofe and devotyn.
In this derke realm am I fastened, with a fadinge thirst for lyte.
Mine owene eye can no lenger see it. Wolde ye seke the eye of oon who myght?
I may nat ever be hool, for I am namoore free from this place.
My soule is here, yscatered among the reynes. The dreem of freedom is ded and gon.
May thine own spirit persist in its strife against the shadow of annihilation.
Gramercy, Strangere. The light is a warmth unto my spent soule.
Gramercy, Strangere. The sighte of such a thing stirreth my remembrances.
Gramercy, Strangere. The memories within doth summon me back to the aforetimes.
Gramercy, Strangere. Your lyf doth soften the keen edge of these memories thou hast stirred.
Gramercy, Strangere. It is a grete sadness that I can nowe see lighte, but only as a pale reflectioun of a tyme that hath passed.
Take my radynce, that thou mayst cleave through shadowe.

lines.name: The Merchant
lines.description: The Merchant is bound to his own Greed, unable to accept that his life's work was taken from him. With hope, it's possible he could rebuild.

lines.name: The Alchemist
lines.description: The Alchemist is lost in a maze of Arrogance, too sure of himself to see his own failings. With hope, he might find humility and purpose.

lines.name: The Craftsman
lines.description: The Craftsman is comsumed with Ire, seeing malice and unfairness in everything. It's possible that with hope, he may heal and forgive.

lines.name: The Harlot
lines.description: The Harlot is overwhelmed with Shame, unable to accept herself, her place, and her traumas. But hope may yet pierce her shell.

lines.name: The Coward
lines.description: The Coward is stuck in his fear like a mire. Visions of a terrible Goddess plague him, as he is unable to cope with the despair of the Necrovale. It is dubious whether he is able to be saved, or worth saving at all.

lines.name: The Cynic
lines.description: The Cynic is frozen into the safety of his negativity. By always going to the worst case, he is never surprised or disappointed. But with hope, he may yet see a reason to continue on.

lines.name: The Mystic
lines.description: The Mystic is lost in his attempts to understand what can never be understood: the world itself. With hope, he may find a path back to the humble world of mortals.

lines.name: The Wretch
lines.description: The Wretch is a lost cause, too far gone into the hopelessness of the Necrovale. Don't waste your time with him.

lines.name: The Gardener
lines.description: The Gardener is possessed with a foolish optimism. All that can be done is to help him along his journey.

lines.name: Sanguinary
lines.subtitle: Restore your health in exchange for Hope

lines.name: Respite
lines.subtitle: Take a brief rest to mend

lines.name: Test of Might
lines.subtitle: Do as much damage as possible before time runs out

lines.name: Test of Arrogance
lines.subtitle: An item with an increased Refinement Level awaits

lines.subtitle: Sneak into any area of the Dungeons

lines.name: Cemetery
lines.subtitle: Exhume the graves for a reward

lines.name: Wishing Well
lines.subtitle: Toss in Coins for a reward

lines.name: Fools Fount
lines.subtitle: Spend your health on items of increasing Rarity

lines.name: Calfshead Pub
lines.subtitle: Have a drink, keep the peace

lines.name: Observatory
lines.subtitle: Survive the waves of Draugur Magi

lines.name: Rat's Nest
lines.subtitle: Find an Escape from the endless Rats

lines.name: Necrotower
lines.subtitle: Destroy the tower to stymy the Draugur

lines.name: Slime Pit
lines.subtitle: Find an escape from the Slime

lines.name: Undercroft
lines.subtitle: Clear the Draugur while avoiding the Aggrieved Spirit

lines.name: Sanctum
lines.subtitle: Listen to the wisdom of the Mystic

lines.name: Embermine
lines.subtitle: Mine the crystals to find Embers

lines.name: Loculus
lines.subtitle: Sacrifice an item for a Flickering Ember

lines.name: Outpost
lines.subtitle: Find and kill all the Cretin Rangers

lines.name: Depot
lines.subtitle: Survive the onslaught of Cretin Sappers

lines.name: Colosseum
lines.subtitle: Survive the rounds of Colossus attacks

lines.name: Bombardment
lines.subtitle: Destroy the Sappers before they destroy the idol

lines.name: Innocent's Folly
lines.subtitle: Protect the Innocent from the Raiders

lines.name: Cradle
lines.subtitle: Destroy all the Colossus before they grow out of control

lines.name: Abyssal Plane
lines.subtitle: An item with a higher Refinement Level awaits

lines.name: Treasure Vault
lines.subtitle: Collect some treasure from the Cat
